description:
YARG (a.k.a. Yet Another Rhythm Game) is a free, open-source, plastic guitar game still in development.
It supports guitar (five fret), drums (plastic or e-kit), vocals, pro-guitar, and more!

V2.0.0.description:
# Version 2.0.0 of Yet Another YARG Archipelago 
## **This is an alpha! Minimally tested and likely very buggy!**

### Major Changes
- **Dynamic location and item names**: Locations and items now use the actual names of your custom songs in-game for all players to see. This is achieved by reading each player's YAML when Archipelago loads and dynamically creating locations based on every player's song list.
- **No more client**: Everything now happens completely inside YARG.
  - All settings are now defined in the YAML, including song pools, song plando and the list of songs to use in your seed.
  - It is **Highly** recommended use the **YARG YAML Creator** to generate your YAML. It is required at minimum to generate your song list.

### New Features
- **Instrument Randomizer**: Each instrument you define in at least one of your pools will be scattered across the multiworld. You must collect the instrument item to play songs from pools requiring that instrument. You will always start with one instrument.
- **Combined goal criteria**: Instead of choosing between "Collect X fame points" OR "Complete X percent of your songs," you can now require both, either individually, or neither.
- **New goal condition**: In addition to previous goal conditions, you can now require finding your individual goal song unlock item in the pool.
- **New YAML Creator**: A standalone program for creating your YAML file. This is **required** as it is the only way to fill in the hash string or obtain the Song Export file needed for the "Song List" option.

### Small update bringing the Stable plugin to YARG v0.14.0.
- Added support for YARG Stable version 0.14.0 - both Nightly and Stable plugin versions currently have complete feature parity

V2.2.0.description:
# YAYARG AP V2.2.0
#### First official release in the Archipelago discord server!

### APWorld Changes
- Updated how song inclusions and exclusions are defined.
- Added a global song exclusion list.
- Added a **Failure Prevention** item that prevents a song failure once per item by restoring the rock meter to 1/4.
- If a pool with 0 songs is plando’d to the goal song, its amount is now set to 1 so the goal song can be placed.

### Client Changes
- Added an optional display for songs you found the unlock item for but are missing the required instrument.
- The utility menu in the song library can now be minimized.
- Traps and filler now show which player sent them when activated.
- Traps and filler now only apply while playing songs that can produce a location check.
- In-game AP messages are now properly colored when displayed as toasts.
- YAML Creator overhaul and general cleanup.
- Nightly plugin updated to YARG Nightly b3455

**Not compatible with earlier APWorld or Client versions!**

Setup Guide:
https://github.com/Thedrummonger/Archipelago/blob/YARGV2/worlds/yayarg/docs/guide_en.md
V2.2.0.title: V2.2.0

V2.3.0.description:
## Yet Another YARG AP V2.3.0

### Client Changes
- Custom AP-styled toasts. Regular non item messages use a white AP icon, junk items use a blue icon, and progression/useful items use a rainbow AP icon. Progression items also have a green background.
- Clicking a song pool header now shows who found the instrument for that pool and where it was found.
- Your last successful connection details are now saved in the connection dialog between sessions.
- Fix: The goal song now properly requires its instrument.
- Fix: Preventing song fail will no longer consume multiple items.
- Fix: Certain misplaced or misspelled UI elements in the YAML creator.

### APWorld Changes
- Add a new "random_variance" option for song pools. When `random_variance` is greater than zero, `amount_in_pool` is replaced with a randomly selected value between `amount_in_pool − random_variance` and `amount_in_pool + random_variance`.
  - Example: Amount 10 with variance 3 results in 7–13 songs.
- You can now use the `include` list to force a song into a pool that would normally be outside its difficulty range.

Setup Guide:
https://github.com/Thedrummonger/Archipelago/blob/YARGV2/worlds/yayarg/docs/guide_en.md

V2.4.0.description:
## Yet Another YARG AP V2.4.0
### APWorld Changes
- New Song Pool settings: `Min Time` and `Max Time`. Lets you define the minimum and maximum song length (in seconds) allowed in the pool.
- New setting: `Song Pack Percentage`. Choose what percentage of songs unlock as part of a song pack instead of the previous all-or-nothing behavior.
- New setting: `Extra Song Unlock Percentage`. Adds a second copy of a percentage of your song unlock items to the pool.
- New *experimental* setting `Max Setlist Time`: Limits total setlist duration; removes songs until the total time is at or below the configured maximum.
  - Must be added to the yaml and configured manually; can easily cause generation issues if not used carefully.
- The selected goal song has been added to the spoiler log.
- The spoiler log now lists what songs are unlocked from each song pack.
- The base YARG setlist now always loads into the APWorld allowing unit tests and fuzzer runs pass properly.
- Fix: Prevent song distribution from stealing plando’d goal songs or pool inclusions to fill other pools.
- Fix: The `YAYARG Song Data` folder is now always created when the world is loaded.
- Fix: No longer create locations and items for for songs on instruments they don't have charts for.

### Client Changes
- Add a soft Song cap of 500 to the YAML creator. This can be bypassed, but will warn of issues with larger song list.
- The keybind to open the connection window can now be remapped in the BepInEx config 
  - installation/BepInEx/config/thedrummonger.yarg.archipelago.cfg
- Increased arbitrary setting caps in the YAML Creator to match APWorld limits.
- The client will now refuse to connect to worlds generated with a different version.
- Added a toggle to set what triggers a death link (client only toggle for now, no yaml setting) (#2) @ihavespoons
- Fix: Restart Trap crash (hopefully for real this time).
- Fix: Reload the song library on disconnect to remove AP headers.
- Fix: Clamp any songs with negative intensity values to 0. Should fix Guitar Hero 1 - 3 exports not being recognized as valid songs.
- Fix: Connection no longer blocks the game tread (#1) @alexkibler

Tested against [YARG nightly b3525](https://github.com/YARC-Official/YARG-Bleedingedge/releases/tag/b3525)
***Newer version may be incompatible.***

#### ⚠️ Warning!
You **must** regenerate your song export list by rescanning your songs in YARG after installing the new plugin for this release.  
It’s also recommended to delete and fully replace any older versions of the YAML Creator and its cache file.

If you don’t, world generation **will** fail.

This version is **not compatible with older worlds.**

Setup Guide:
https://github.com/Thedrummonger/Archipelago/blob/YARGV2/worlds/yayarg/docs/guide_en.md
